Uses of Interface
com.hcl.domino.mime.RichTextMimeConversionSettings

  • Packages that use RichTextMimeConversionSettings 
    Package Description
    com.hcl.domino.mime  

    • Uses of RichTextMimeConversionSettings in com.hcl.domino.mime

      Methods in com.hcl.domino.mime that return RichTextMimeConversionSettings 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RichTextMimeConversionSettings MimeWriter.createRichTextMimeConversionSettings()
      Creates a new RichTextMimeConversionSettings with system default settings.
      RichTextMimeConversionSettings RichTextMimeConversionSettings.setAddItems(List<String> itemNames)
      The function sets the Conversions Controls 'add items setting' setting to the input value.
      RichTextMimeConversionSettings RichTextMimeConversionSettings.setAttachmentEncoding(RichTextMimeConversionSettings.AttachmentEncoding encoding)
      The function sets the Conversions Controls 'attachment encoding' setting to the input value.
      RichTextMimeConversionSettings RichTextMimeConversionSettings.setDefaults()
      The function sets Conversion Controls configuration settings to their default values.
      RichTextMimeConversionSettings RichTextMimeConversionSettings.setDropItems(List<String> itemNames)
      The function sets the Conversions Controls 'drop items setting' setting to the input value, a list of items to drop during export.
      RichTextMimeConversionSettings RichTextMimeConversionSettings.setKeepTabs(boolean b)
      The function sets the Conversions Controls 'keep tabs' setting to the input value.
      RichTextMimeConversionSettings RichTextMimeConversionSettings.setMessageContentEncoding(RichTextMimeConversionSettings.MessageContentEncoding enc)
      The function sets the Conversions Controls 'message content encoding' setting to the input value.
      RichTextMimeConversionSettings RichTextMimeConversionSettings.setPointSize(int size)
      The function sets the Conversions Controls 'point size' setting to the input value.
      RichTextMimeConversionSettings RichTextMimeConversionSettings.setReadReceipt(RichTextMimeConversionSettings.ReadReceipt rc)
      The function sets the Conversions Controls read receipt setting to the input value
      RichTextMimeConversionSettings RichTextMimeConversionSettings.setSkipX(boolean b)
      The function sets the Conversions Controls 'skip X-Notes-Item headers' setting to the input value.
      RichTextMimeConversionSettings RichTextMimeConversionSettings.setTypeface(RichTextMimeConversionSettings.Typeface tf)
      The function sets the Conversions Controls 'typeface' setting to the input value.
      Methods in com.hcl.domino.mime with parameters of type RichTextMimeConversionSettings 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MimeWriter.convertToMime(Document doc, RichTextMimeConversionSettings convertSettings)
      This function converts all rich text items (type ItemDataType.TYPE_COMPOSITE) in the document to MIME items (type ItemDataType.TYPE_MIME_PART).

      It does not update the database; to update the database, save the document.
